note.p: Career: MP for Mitchell (1734-1741); MP for Morpeth (1741-1755); Secretary to the Chancellor of the Exchequer (1742-1743); Deputy Cofferer of the Household (1743-1744); Chief Baron of the Scottish Exchequer (1755-1775); built a house in Scotland and lived there during his appointment; Chancellor of the Diocese of Durham (1753-1764)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; LI; Sedgwick; Namier
Notes: DNB gives death date as 04 February 1778.
